issue.title: Compilation error when ogre 1.9 and libcegui-mk2-0.7.6 are installed

content.raw: instead of declaring incompatibility, we could just have an `ifdef` around the [AttachCameraToImage](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/78c09d7671d3910e7b38361e345c81df056920cd/gazebo/rendering/GUIOverlay.cc#cl-351) function when the system has conflicting ogre and cegui versions. I think that function is not essential for GUIOverlay to work so we could live without it. But let's confirm with @nkoenig first.
content.html: instead of declaring incompatibility, we could just have an ifdef around the AttachCameraToImage function when the system has conflicting ogre and cegui versions. I think that function is not essential for GUIOverlay to work so we could live without it. But let's confirm with @nkoenig first.
